name: LiveFlow
headline: LiveFlow empowers finance leaders with real-time insights into everyâ¦
description: LiveFlow turns your Google Sheets and Excel spreadsheet into a live FP&A dashboard in minutes.

founders.name: Lasse Kalkar, Founder
founders.description: I'm Lasse - I love to build companies. Before LiveFlow, I was Head of Growth, Nordics at Revolut where I led Growth and Market Launches in the Nordics. I also worked at Nova Founders Capital where we built an executive conference and last, I built a micro-investing app that allowed you to round up your spare change and invest it in crypto (Acorns for crypto), but that failed :)

founders.name: Anita Koimur, Founder
founders.description: Anita is the COO at LiveFlow. Before starting the venture, Anita was in charge of Business Development at Revolut Rewards. She consolidated the position of Rewards as a data-driven customer acquisition platform for partners and a customer engagement solution for Revolut. Anita led the product rollout to thirteen markets across EMEA, the United States, and APAC.

## Today’s finance teams are buried in tedious and inefficient workflows.
Increased frustration as teams waste time exporting CSV files
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66b333670ffc2b111d1d2aad_001-abacus.svg)
Multi-layer review processes for error-prone model updates
More hours spent on copy pasting than on actual analysis
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66b333672d35d86964126c28_002-system-update.svg)
The learning curve for new accounting apps is steep
Lost revenue opportunities because of slow feedback cycles
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66b3336775c52586f74616ba_003-puzzle.svg)

## LiveFlow empowers finance leaders with real-time insights into every aspect of their business
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66a51cacda6293d19600f056_gradient%20blur.webp)
## Meet your new finance superpower
LiveFlow, the only platform you need to scale finance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/6787c162a86e30958afe6cd6_reporting-1.avif)
### Design **intuitive financial dashboards**
.. that aligns your whole team.
[Learn more](https://www.liveflow.com/</dashboards>)
## Your fastest close is a click away
### Deliver **board-ready consolidated financials** in minutes.
Say hello to automatic consolidation.
[Automate consolidation](https://www.liveflow.com/</consolidation>)
![live consolidation dashboard graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/677ebf0be0e3a745d5219f35_Image.avif)
### Say goodbye to manual mapping
**4001 Service _Income_** in one entity and **4001 Service _Revenue_** in another entity? No problem! We got you. 
![A man and a woman standing in front of a glass wall.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66a4ce73fa33ebd5056fdd2a_consolidation%203.webp)
### Design reports that **read the minds of your stakeholders**
Give every stakeholder exactly what they need, exactly how they want it. From board summaries to team analysis, create perfect reports in minutes, not hours
![Google Sheets Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/61f27b4a37d6d7480580038b_Google%20Sheets%20Icon.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/65ee12ffe020cd817c908c32_Excel%20Logo.png)
## Transform Excel & Google Sheets into your financial command center
### Connect accounting data to Excel or Google Sheets and watch your model update effortlessly.
.. and say goodbye to manual CSV uploads.
[Eliminate manual work](https://www.liveflow.com/</products/liveflow-for-microsoft-excel>)
![A screen shot of a spreadsheet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66a6589edd07286a24110b90_spreadsheet-1-.webp)
![A woman sitting at a desk in front of a laptop computer.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66a4ce734421398ae9f33833_spreadsheet2.webp)
### Library of 100+ Reporting Templates
Hundreds of finance teams and accounting firms automate manual workflows with LiveFlow.
[Browse our library](https://www.liveflow.com/</templates>)
### Customize your reports exactly the way you want
  * Add columns and rows without breaking your dashboard.
  * Your custom formulas stay when reports refresh automatically.
  * Save time by starting with our pre-built templates. 


![G2 Crowd logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/62486d98dcece428ea968070_7394406_g2_g2%20logo_icon.png)
# Don't just take our word for it
See why the top minds in finance love to use LiveFlow
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da7a6eae5451bedf82692_FinancialAnalysis_Leader_Leader.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da654b5f8bc0627c83cdd_FinancialClose_BestUsability_Total.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da7a8559e65c7a346f33d_FinancialAnalysis_BestRelationship_Total.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da63f8b891fc0ca8c3068_BudgetingandForecasting_MomentumLeader_Leader.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da7aaeae5451bedf82879_CorporatePerformanceManagement\(CPM\)_EasiestSetup_EaseOfSetup.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da626210c4b06e311f2e8_CorporatePerformanceManagement\(CPM\)_BestEstimatedROI_Roi.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da7a5326b84ab36da203a_FinancialClose_UsersMostLikelyToRecommend_Mid-Market_Nps.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da7a5a4e00847f77cdbeb_CorporatePerformanceManagement\(CPM\)_EasiestToDoBusinessWith_EaseOfDoingBusinessWith.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/660da7a559b9ad2ebb7d7f1e_CorporatePerformanceManagement\(CPM\)_HighPerformer_HighPerformer.png)](https://www.liveflow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/liveflow/reviews>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/67533ba079df5799116c7afd_Roberto%20Carroz%20Nelo.webp)
“LiveFlow saves us 3 days per month on consolidation”
Despite outsourcing to complete Nelo’s reporting on time, the consolidation process was taking too long. With the help of LiveFlow, Roberto and his team was able to automatically consolidate Nelo's financials, saving them days per month, enabling their decision-making at lightning speed.
ROBERTO CARROZ
Nelo
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/67533bc91dbf6922626bfacd_nelo%20white.svg)
![Emily Manashi](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/6777f0fb71538bfa2d3edeea_Emily%20Manashi%20-%20YCombinator.avif)
“LiveFlow gives us unparalleled access to our financial data.”
I have already recommended LiveFlow! I love the ability to create a report and not have to touch it again.No one wants to do the manual work. It allows you to have unparalleled access to your data.
Emily Manashi
Y Combinator
![Y Combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/6777f0fbb0de802d462afcad_Rectangle%2060.avif)
![OpenZeppelin](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/6777f0fbe408a52975c1a25f_OpenZeppelin.avif)
"LiveFlow has upgraded our Financial Reporting processes from 10 to 3 days."
Having a live view of performance across entities not only simplifies reporting processes but provides ongoing strategic insights to management. I very much recommend it. The flexibility that the team has provided so far, incorporating feedback from us as customers is a very valuable quality. 
Jaime Barriga Amin
VP of Finance, OpenZeppelin
![OpenZeppelin Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/6777f0fb9d0795e09794e376_OpenZeppelin%20Logo.avif)
![Client Yehuda thumbnail photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66b5d80987b11b385d0bbc4f_yehuda.webp)
"LiveFlow is the only product I've found that does consolidation easily."
LiveFlow allows Yehuda and Kalshi to consolidate multiple entities without worrying about outdated numbers and having to update their model manually every month.
YEHUDA TENENBAUM
Finance Manager at Kalshi
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61f27b4a37d6d702688002ba/66b5d7549304ec302b618ade_logo-12-white.webp)

.. that aligns your whole team.

generated_description:
LiveFlow is a promising fintech startup founded in 2021, nestled in the bustling heart of New York City and part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W21. With a mission to empower finance leaders, LiveFlow harnesses the power of real-time insights, allowing teams to navigate their financial landscapes with unprecedented clarity.

Initially, LiveFlow set out to transform static Google Sheets and Excel spreadsheets into dynamic FP&A dashboards in mere minutes. Fast forward to today, and the company has raised a robust $13.5 million in Series A funding led by Valar Ventures, pushing innovation further with the launch of **LiveFlow Next**—aimed specifically at revolutionizing the financial reporting process.

Comprising a skilled team of 47, LiveFlow develops solutions that tackle the inefficiencies prevalent in finance workflows. Their product suite includes tools designed for Google Sheets, Excel, consolidation of multiple entities, and professional dashboards. This flexibility allows finance teams to automate manual tasks, thereby speeding up the financial closing process from days to mere minutes, a change that nearly every CFO would welcome.

Feedback from clients underscores LiveFlow’s impact, with testimonials highlighting significant time savings—like reducing monthly consolidation from ten days to just three. Their platform not only enhances the accuracy of data but also enables finance departments to focus on what truly matters: analysis and strategic insights rather than getting bogged down in cumbersome data management.
